meanings.definition: A type of seaweed or edible algae.
meanings.sent1: The dulses washed ashore on the beach.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed a salad with fresh dulses.
meanings.sent3: The dulses danced in the ocean waves.
meanings.sent4: The dulses swayed gently in the underwater currents.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green dulses added color to the rocky shore.

meanings.definition: Plural form of dulse, a type of seaweed.
meanings.sent1: Many dulses were found clinging to the rocks.
meanings.sent2: The chef used dulses to create a delicious soup.
meanings.sent3: The dulses whispered secrets to the other seaweed.
meanings.sent4: The dulses formed a protective barrier along the coast.
meanings.sent5: The salty taste of the dulses reminded her of the sea.

meanings.definition: The act of gathering or harvesting dulse.
meanings.sent1: The dulses were carefully collected by the fishermen.
meanings.sent2: She learned the art of dulses picking from her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The dulses seemed to jump into the basket themselves.
meanings.sent4: The market was bustling with activity during the dulses harvest.
meanings.sent5: The dulses picking season brought joy to the coastal community.
